Suggestion.first:
• Consider using natural light during daylight hours.
• Switch to energy-efficient LED bulbs if not already in use.
• Ensure aircon temperature is set optimally (e.g., 24-25°C) to avoid excessive energy use.
• Close windows and doors to reduce cooling load.
• Unplug chargers and AVRs when not in use to avoid phantom loads.
• Optimize fan settings for the room size and reduce uneccesarry use.
